title: Looking for some guys who want to level, post stats under 4inches need not apply
body: Just looking for some guys to get that xp boost for being in a 5man.

replies.body: I love meat and I love balls
Meatball is best. Get fked if u picked pizza. If u want pizza, buy a pizza instead of a sub.
As opposed to getting meatballs instead of a sub
Teriyaki chicken ftw, or Italian B.M.T.
